terminal.welcome_name: My name is Gabriel Mendes Lopes and I am a Fullstack Developer.
terminal.welcome_help: Type 'help' to see the list of available commands.
terminal.type_help: Type 'help' to see the list of commands.
terminal.matrix_activated: Matrix effect activated. Type 'clear' to disable.
terminal.matrix_already_active: Matrix effect is already active. Use 'clear' to disable.

tips: The apps are functional and clickable!
Right-click on the desktop to change the wallpaper!
Drag windows by the title bar to move them!
Right-click on me to change pets!
Use the terminal for secret commands!
The CRT button on the taskbar activates the retro effect!
The calculator has scientific, programmer, and calculus modes!
You can minimize windows by clicking the icon on the taskbar!
Try the 'matrix' command in the terminal!
Notepad auto-saves in your browser!
Press ESC to close Spotlight!
Themes can be changed in the Themes app!
The Music Player plays real radios!
Resize windows by dragging the edges!
The calculator history saves your calculations!
Try the snake game in the Games app!
Click on me to make me run to you!
The ASCII Player converts videos to ASCII art!
Use Ctrl+Space to open Spotlight!
Hello! I'm your virtual pet!

easter_eggs.konami_found: Congratulations! You found the Konami code!
easter_eggs.rickroll_hint: Hint: Try the "rickroll" command in the terminal!

commands.help: Available Commands: Portfolio: about - Shows information about me. experience - Shows my professional experience. projects - Lists my main projects. skills - Lists my technical and interpersonal skills. courses - Shows my courses and certifications. languages - Lists the languages I speak. contact - Shows my contact information. github - Shows my GitHub statistics. resume - Link to download my resume. Utilities: clear - Clears the screen. welcome - Shows the welcome message again. quote - Shows an inspiring programming quote. achievements - Lists your unlocked achievements. extras - Extra commands and exploration.
commands.sobre: About Me Hello! I'm Gabriel Mendes Lopes, a fullstack developer passionate about creating efficient, scalable, and robust solutions. I'm currently in the 5th semester of Information Systems at FIPP (Faculty of Informatics of Presidente Prudente). I live in Anhumas, SP, Brazil. I'm a CNPq Technological Initiation Scholarship holder at FCT Unesp. I'm interested in application development and automation. I'm proactive, dedicated, and always seeking continuous learning to become an excellent professional.
commands.experiencia: Professional Experience Technological Initiation Scholarship (PIBITI) - Unesp September 2025 - September 2026 (1 year) - Responsible for the development and automation of equipment for measuring piezoelectric properties (d33) in polymers. - Development of closed-loop control software with Arduino to integrate and manage pneumatic actuators and load sensors. - Prototyping, systematic testing for equipment validation, and documentation preparation for patent and software registration.
commands.projetos: My Projects 1. New Employee Registration System - Description: Multi-tenant system for employee admission registration, allowing accountants to manage unique forms and collect employee information securely. - Technologies: HTML, CSS (TailwindCSS), JavaScript, Supabase (PostgreSQL), Vercel Serverless Functions. 2. Piezo Peak Analyzer (PPA) - Description: Desktop application for analysis and visualization of piezoelectric sensor measurements, with peak detection, power calculation, and synchronized interactive graphs. - Technologies: Java 24, JavaFX, Maven, BigDecimal (high numerical precision). 3. Absorbance Point Analyzer (APA) - Description: Absorbance spectroscopy data analysis system for peak detection and beta phase ratio calculation in crystallographic analysis. - Technologies: Java 24, JavaFX, Maven, ControlsFX, ValidatorFX.
commands.skills: Technical and Interpersonal Skills Hard Skills (Technical): - Languages: Java, C, C++, Go, JavaScript, Python. - Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL. - DevOps & Tools: Git, CI/CD, Nginx. - Cloud: Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure (AZ-900). - Data Analysis: Power BI. - Architecture: Microservices, RESTful APIs. Soft Skills (Interpersonal): - Communication, Problem Solving, Proactivity, Teamwork, Negotiation.
commands.cursos: Courses and Certifications - 2024: Complete C and C++ Language Course (UDEMY) - 2024: Power BI (SENAI) - 2024: Python 1 (SENAI) - 2024: Integrated IoT Solutions (SENAI) - 2023: Cloud AI Services Deployment - Google Cloud AI (SENAI) - 2023: Cloud Services Deployment - Microsoft AZ-900 (SENAI)
commands.idiomas: Languages - Portuguese: Native - English: Advanced (C1 Level) - Spanish: Basic
commands.contato: Contact Me - Email: asdgabrielmlopes@gmail.com - WhatsApp: +55 18 99618-9978 - LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/gabriel-lopes-18b839270/ - GitHub: github.com/ShybaPsY
commands.download_cv: Resume Download Click the link below to download my CV in PDF format. Link: Gabriel_Mendes_Lopes_CV.pdf Or view the interactive version: Open CV
commands.extras: Extra Commands: Exploration: ls - Lists available files and directories. tree - Shows portfolio tree structure. neofetch - System information (Linux style). desktop - Shows desktop apps. Easter Eggs: secret - Discover hidden commands. coffee - Get a virtual coffee. sudo - Try to get root permissions. hack - Hack the mainframe (simulation). 42 - The ultimate answer. vim - Enter the Vim editor. sl - ASCII Locomotive. matrix - Matrix effect on background. rickroll - Never gonna give you up... Type any command above to explore it!
